text:
Yeah I don't get any notifications also, sometimes I just forget to check =(
I wouldn't mind finding another platform, but I think they'd rather we stick through here. How about we share emails and can nudge each other? hahahaha
Also I just realized I have a really good friend who was a lead animator on "The Tiger Who Came to Tea" Amanda Holm. Been checking out her shots the film looks gorgeous!
And thanks for asking about the short film, I still have a ways to go before animation :smiley:
And how's work, or your personal projects going?
